entry.title: Former FTX executive Ryan Salame has reported to prison and will serve 7 and a half years
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, October 13, according to The Block, former FTX executive Ryan Salame has begun serving a sentence of seven and a half years in a prison in Maryland, USA.
According to the Federal Bureau of Prisons website, Salame, who was the co-CEO of FTX Digital Markets, was imprisoned in FCI Cumberland in Maryland as of Saturday morning. The prison is a "medium-security federal correctional institution with a minimum-security satellite camp." According to its website, there are more than 1,000 prisoners in the prison.
On Thursday, Salame shared a post on LinkedIn that seemed to be teasing his situation.
"I'm happy to share with you that I'm starting a new position at FCI Cumberland: Prisoner," Salame posted.

entry.title: A SPX whale address with a profit of 289 times is selling SPX to lock in profits
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 12, according to Lookonchain monitoring, a whale address holding 19.15 million SPX (about 15.7 million US dollars) is selling SPX to take profits. The address's profit on SPX is about 14 million US dollars, with a return of 289 times.
The address spent $48,400 on Solana to buy 19.15 million SPX between January 29 and March 21. He bridged all SPX to the Ethereum network and started selling SPX on October 3. So far, the address has sold 4.15 million SPX at a price of 708 ETH and still holds 15 million SPX (about 12.3 million US dollars).

entry.title: DWF Labs co-founder: The Meme coin market is mature and stable, and institutionalized investment in Meme coins remains a priority
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 12, DWF Labs co-founder Andrei Grachev posted on social media: "The Meme coin market has become a mature and stable part of the industry. It takes advantage of extreme fear and greed, allowing smart investors and traders to make huge fortunes. DWF Labs institutionalized investment in Meme coins a few years ago, and this remains one of our priorities."

entry.title: KOL Murad opened a position of 10.25 million SPX four months ago and has now made a profit of 7900%
entry.summary: BlockBeats reported that on October 12, according to monitoring by The Data Nerd, Meme coin KOL Murad spent $98,000 four months ago to build a position of 10.25 million SPX at an average price of $0.0096. Based on the current price of $0.7702, the value of the position has risen to $7.89 million, with unrealized profits of $7.79 million and a return on investment of approximately 7,900%.

entry.title: Axelarâ€™s highest single-day increase on the Binance trading platform exceeded 40%, ranking third on the list of increases
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 12, according to market data, Axelar (AXL) had the highest daily increase of more than 40% on the Binance trading platform, ranking third on the list of increases. The 24-hour trading increased by 663.9%, and is expected to exceed the total daily trading volume of 100 million US dollars.
Axelar announced the launch of the Mobius Development Stack (MDS) on the 3rd of this month, a new milestone in blockchain technology, aimed at bringing developers unlimited possibilities for cross-chain ecology. Axelar MDS provides a complete set of open tools and protocols that can achieve seamless connection between cross-chain applications and users and logic, ensuring transparency and security from the starting point to the end point.

entry.title: Bitget launches Telegram application center to encourage developers to build an ecosystem together
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 12, Bitget officially launched the Telegram App Center, aiming to encourage developers to launch innovative applications and robots to further enrich the ecosystem.
The Bitget Telegram App Center is a curated platform with more than 600 applications and robots developed based on the Telegram Open Network (TON). Users can browse blockchain services, experience innovative games, and explore cutting-edge Web3 tools in this space, all in the familiar Telegram interface.
In addition, Bitget is about to launch a Telegram-exclusive event, completing designated tasks to share a 2,000 USDT prize pool. The event will be held from 20:00 on October 14 (UTC+8) to 20:00 on October 28 (UTC+8). For more details, please see the official announcement of Bitget.

entry.title: Bitget pre-market trading will be available on X Empire (X)
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 12, according to official news, X Empire (X) will be launched on Bitget pre-market trading. Users can trade in advance before X opens spot trading.
Start time: October 12 16:00 (UTC+8) End time: To be determined Spot trading time: To be determined Delivery time: To be determined Pre-market trading pair: X/USDT

entry.title: TAO briefly broke through $650, with a 24-hour increase of 14.89%
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 12, according to HTX market information, TAO briefly broke through $650, reaching a high of $658.2, and is now quoted at $645, a 24-hour increase of 14.89%.

entry.title: Bored Ape BAYC #7940 sold for 588 ETH, about $1.433 million
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 12, according to Cryptoslam data, about an hour ago, "Bored Ape" BAYC #7940 was sold through the X2Y2 platform for 588 ETH, equivalent to about 1,433,582.38 US dollars. The seller is the address starting with OxBcd8. It is reported that BAYC #7940 is a relatively unique clean and beautiful golden ape in the entire "Bored Ape" series.

entry.title: HBO's documentary "Trying to Uncover the Identity of Satoshi Nakamoto" has an IMDb score of 5.6
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 10, according to the official website of IMDb, the documentary "Money Electric: The Bitcoin Mystery" launched by Home Box Office (HBO) that attempts to decipher the identity of Satoshi Nakamoto is currently rated 5.6/10.
IMDb is the abbreviation of Internet Movie Database, which is an online database platform that provides information on movies, TV shows, actors, directors, etc.

entry.title: Bitget announces latest coin listing standards and strengthens token review process
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 10, Bitget announced the update of the coin listing standards and further strengthened the token review process. All projects to be listed must pass a rigorous comprehensive evaluation, focusing on the token economic model, token supply and distribution, practicality, and the background and qualifications of the development team. In addition, Bitget also requires projects to submit detailed business plans and roadmaps. This series of measures is aimed at improving the transparency and trust of the platform, protecting the interests of users, and preventing related risks. For newly listed projects, Bitget will focus on evaluating fully diluted valuation (FDV), financing background, token unlocking schedule, and financial, security, compliance, political and ethiâ€¦

entry.title: Coinbase International has launched ARKM perpetual contracts
entry.summary: BlockBeats reported that on October 10, according to the official announcement, Coinbase International and Coinbase Advanced have launched Arkham (ARKM) perpetual contracts. Limit, market, stop loss and limit stop orders are now available.

entry.title: Amid the competition among public chains, what is Alephium's trump card? | Dialogue with the frontline
entry.summary: The competition among L1 in today's blockchain market is increasingly fierce. Mainstream public chains such as Ethereum and Solana have occupied a major position in the industry with their huge ecology and network effects. If emerging public chains want to stand out in this pattern, they must make breakthroughs in technological innovation and ecological construction. With the development of the market, many projects have begun to pay more attention to community building and market operations, while the investment in underlying technologies has been relatively reduced, which makes public chain projects with real technological innovations extremely valuable. Alephium has emerged in this context. It is committed to integrating the advantages of Bitcoin and Ethereum, using a unique PoLW consenâ€¦

entry.title: Bloomberg: Nearly half of traditional hedge funds are getting involved in cryptocurrency
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, October 10, according to Bloomberg, the Alternative Investment Management Association (AIMA) and PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) released the "Global Crypto Hedge Fund Report" on Thursday, showing that 47% of hedge funds trading in traditional markets have been involved in digital assets, up from 29% in 2023 and 37% in 2022. Of the funds that have already invested in crypto, 67% plan to maintain the same level of crypto capital, while the remaining funds plan to increase investment by the end of 2024.
According to the report, although many hedge funds initially entered the crypto field by trading tokens in the spot market, they are now increasingly adopting more complex strategies. Among the funds involved in crypto trading, 58% of funds traded derivatives in 2024, up from 38% in 2023, while the proportion of trading funds in the spot market fell from a peak of 69% last year to 25% this year.
â€œThe results of this yearâ€™s report show that confidence has been steadily recovering over the past year,â€ James Delaney, director of asset management regulation at AIMA, said in an interview. â€œThe regulatory clarity that is beginning to emerge around the world is indeed increasing confidence in this asset class.â€
Due to the wild fluctuations in cryptocurrency prices, funds willing to get involved are often able to obtain profitable trading opportunities.

entry.title: South Korea to review lifting ban on crypto spot ETFs
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, October 10, according to The Block, South Korea's top financial regulator said it would re-evaluate the lifting of the existing ban on local spot cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and institutional accounts of crypto exchanges.
The Financial Services Commission (FSC) of South Korea said in its annual audit report on Thursday that its newly established Cryptocurrency Committee, an advisory group to discuss digital asset policies, will review the current ban.
This shows a shift in the regulator's strict opposition to exposure to digital assets in traditional financial markets.

entry.title: DWF Labsâ€™ yield-generating synthetic stablecoin project is named Falcon Finance
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 10, DWF Labs co-founder Andrei Grachev said on the social platform, "We have finalized the brand name for DWF Labs' yield-based synthetic stablecoin, Falcon Finance. The stablecoin will have two versions: USDf and USDwf.

entry.title: If Bitcoin falls below $60,000, the cumulative long order liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX will reach 253 million
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 10, according to Coinglass data, if Bitcoin falls below $60,000, the cumulative long order liquidation strength of mainstream CEX will reach 253 million;
Conversely, if Bitcoin breaks through $61,500, the cumulative short order liquidation strength of mainstream CEX will reach 545 million.
BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not show the exact number of contracts to be liquidated, or the exact value of the contracts to be liquidated. The columns on the liquidation chart actually show the importance of each liquidation cluster relative to the adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, the strength.
Therefore, the liquidation chart shows the extent to which the underlying price will be affected when it reaches a certain position. A higher "liquidation column" means that the price will react more strongly to the liquidity wave after it arrives.

entry.title: South Korean regulators to review virtual asset market monopoly centered on Upbit
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 10, Kim Byung-hwan, chairman of the Financial Services Commission of South Korea, said that he would review the monopoly phenomenon in the virtual asset market centered on Upbit.
During the national affairs inspection of the National Assembly Political Affairs Committee, Kim Byung-hwan responded to the questioning of lawmakers about Upbit's monopoly structure and pointed out that a comprehensive review would be conducted through the Virtual Assets Committee.

entry.title: Justin Sun's Binance deposit address received 1,000 BTC in the past 24 hours
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 10, according to iChainfo monitoring, Justin Sun's Binance deposit address (starting with 1Fbsri) received a total of 1,000 BTC (about 60.7 million US dollars) in the past 24 hours.
Since May this year, a total of 5,089.99 BTC (308 million US dollars) have been transferred to this address.

entry.title: Bloomberg analyst: Bitcoin spot ETF options are expected to be launched in the United States in Q1 2025
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 10, Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart said that options for Bitcoin spot ETFs may be launched in the United States in the first quarter of 2025.
Seyffart said in a panel discussion at the Permissionless conference on October 9: "I think (Bitcoin spot ETF) options may be launched before the end of the year, but more likely in the first quarter of 2025."
In September of this year, the US SEC authorized Nasdaq to list options related to BlackRock IBIT, and is awaiting final approval from the CFTC and the Options Clearing Corporation (OCC). Seyffart added: "Unlike SEC regulations, the CFTC and OCC do not have strict deadlines, so if they want, they can be further delayed."

entry.title: WBTC completes transition to multi-jurisdictional custody arrangement, with control of its underlying assets shared by Singapore, Hong Kong, China, and the United States
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 10, WBTC has completed its transition to a geographically distributed custody structure. Under the cooperation agreement between BitGo and BiT Global, control of the underlying Bitcoin will now be shared by Singapore, Hong Kong, China, and the United States.
The new custody structure uses a multi-signature agreement that requires two signatures to approve any transaction and transfer funds from the wallet. After successfully switching to multi-jurisdictional custody, BiT Global issued the following statement:
"With diversified geographic jurisdictions including the United States, Hong Kong, China, and Singapore, we ensure that no single jurisdiction/entity controls the custody of WBTC assets."

entry.title: An Ethereum staking whale deposited 3,064 ETH into CEX, equivalent to about $7.53 million
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 10, according to The Data Nerd monitoring, 11 hours ago, ETH pledger 0x634 deposited 3,064 ETH (about 7.53 million US dollars) to Binance. Eight months ago, he increased his holdings of 6,302 ETH at a total price of 16.28 million US dollars and invested them in Swell, Renzo and Lido. If all the above ETH are sold at the current price, even if he earns 2% of ETH from staking, he will lose 218,000 US dollars.

entry.title: Thailand SEC proposes new rules for crypto investments by mutual and private funds
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 10, the Securities and Exchange Commission of Thailand (SEC) has proposed new regulations to allow mutual funds and private equity funds to invest in digital assets in line with international developments and in response to the growing interest of institutional investors.
The draft proposal released on Wednesday is seeking public feedback to revise the standards for fund investments in digital assets. The SEC proposed allowing securities firms and asset management companies to provide services to large investors interested in diversifying their investments into crypto-related products, such as exchange-traded funds (ETFs).
The regulator said the goal is to align with international digital asset developments and provide investors with more portfolio diversification opportunities under expert management. The proposal follows a surge in international demand for U.S.-listed Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs.

entry.title: Delta, a license-free L1 network, completes $11 million in financing, led by Maven 11 and others
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 10, the permissionless L1 network Delta completed $11 million in financing. Delta's pre-seed financing was led by Figment Capital and Maven 11, and Variant and DBA led the seed round. (Blockworks co-founder Michael Ippolito is also an angel investor.)
The functional goals of the Delta architecture are similar to those of major Rollup "clusters", such as OP Superchain, AggLayer, or ZKsync Elastic Chain frameworks, which all face interoperability challenges brought about by Ethereum's Rollup-centric roadmap.
Delta's architecture separates execution and transaction ordering from data availability and settlement, which is theoretically more advantageous than application chains and Rollups. Execution in Delta occurs in individual "domains", similar to Rollups or execution shards for specific applications.

entry.title: Bitmain releases ANTMINER S21+ series mining machines
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, October 9, according to official news, Bitmain released the ANTMINER S21+ series of mining machines today, among which the S21+ Hyd. has a single-machine computing power of 319T and an energy efficiency ratio of 15.0J/T, and the S21+ has a single-machine computing power of 216T and an energy efficiency ratio of 16.5J/T.

entry.title: The People's Bank of China: The online rumor that "the central bank's digital RMB platform will issue digital asset dividends" is untrue, the public should be wary of false information
entry.summary: BlockBeats reported that on October 9, according to Tencent News "First Line", the Digital Currency Research Institute of the People's Bank of China solemnly refuted the rumor that "the central bank's digital RMB platform will issue digital asset dividends". Relevant people emphasized that the institute has never released such information, nor has it organized activities such as registration or subscription of "digital assets" and issuance of "digital asset dividends". Previously, criminals used the name of the institute to release false information involving "joint approval by the Ministry of Finance and the National Data Bureau" and "opening the second batch of asset registration and review". The official reminded the public to be vigilant and guard against fraud, and reiterated that the official download channels of the Digital RMB App are limited to major application markets and official websites.

entry.title: Binance CEO: Launchpool project quotas are strictly for users, and Binance will not seek profits from it
entry.summary: BlockBeats news, on October 9, Binance CEO Richard Teng posted on X: "I received a question about Launchpool quotas on X Spaces before. I hope this explanation will make everyone clear. The project quotas in Launchpool are strictly for Binance users. Binance will not make profits from these quotas that should be used for users, and the final allocation of project quotas is determined by the project party. We have implemented strict control measures, including setting a maximum holding limit for each Launchpool and Pre-Market user, which allows projects to reach users widely and provides protection measures. Of course, this also includes our strict token review process and a dedicated market monitoring team to monitor trading activities on Binance."

entry.title: Bitfinex token LEO surges 40% as US government tells potential victims of 2016 Bitfinex hack
entry.summary:
BlockBeats news, on October 9, according to HTX market information, after the news of "The U.S. government applied for an alternative notification procedure to inform potential victims of the 2016 Bitfinex hacking incident", Bitfinex's platform token LEO rose by 40%, reaching a high of $13, and is now quoted at $7.22, with a 24-hour increase of 22.4%.
It is reported that Bitfinex previously promised to buy back LEO if it took back the hacked Bitcoin.
BlockBeats previously reported that according to documents from the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia, the U.S. government submitted a motion to the court requesting approval to use an alternative notification procedure to notify potential victims of the 2016 Bitfinex hacking incident. The U.S. government said that according to the Criminal Victims Rights Act (CVRA) and the Mandatory Criminal Victims Compensation Act (MVRA), Bitfinex may be the only entity that meets the definition of a victim. However, out of an abundance of caution, the government still wishes to notify potential victims other than Bitfinex (the victimized virtual currency exchange, â€œVICTIM VCEâ€) who are eligible for compensation under the CVRA or MVRA, particularly Bitfinex users whose accounts were devalued after the hack. The government proposes to use the Department of Justiceâ€™s large case website and specialized case website for notification and to allow potential victims to submit statements.

entry.title: Over $100 million in CHZ has been transferred from Binance to Chiliz tokenized addresses in the past two days
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 9, according to Arkham monitoring data, a total of approximately 1.473719 billion CHZ tokens were transferred from Binance to the Chiliz token address in the past two days, with a value of approximately US$103.56 million.
BlockBeats reported today that according to an official announcement, Binance will support the Pepper (1000PEPPER) airdrop for Chiliz (CHZ) holders.
Snapshot time: First snapshot time: 2024-10-10 00:00 (UTC) Second snapshot time: 2024-10-17 00:00 (UTC) Third snapshot time: 2024-10-24 00:00 (UTC) Fourth snapshot time: 2024-10-31 00:00 (UTC)
Airdrop ratio: The code of Pepper token on Binance is 1000PEPPER. This is different from the display on the chain. The number of 1000PEPPER airdropped by each user holding CHZ will be calculated according to the ratio of 1 CHZ = 150 (1000PEPPER), that is, 150 (1000PEPPER) will be airdropped for every 1 CHZ.

entry.title: Lorenzo successfully staked 1,880 BTC in Babylon Cap 2, and the project's total TVL exceeded $100 million
entry.summary:
BlockBeats reported that on October 9, the Bitcoin liquidity finance project Lorenzo successfully pledged 1,880 BTC in Babylon Cap 2, ranking fourth. In this event, Lorenzo pledged 755 BTC and pledged 1,125 BTC through Finality Provider partners BÂ² Network, ChainUp, and Lombard. Through strategic staking, Lorenzo will obtain generous Babylon points and BTCFi rewards for stBTC holders.
At the same time, Lorenzo TVL has officially exceeded 100 million US dollars, marking a new stage of steady growth for the project. In addition, Lorenzo's new staking plan is about to open. It is reported that in the previous two pre-staking phases, users will not only receive Lorenzo points and Babylon expected returns, but also receive Lorenzo token airdrops worth a total of 4.5 million US dollars.
